title: Everything that Rises Must Converge St Sebastian

content.question: In the first sentence of the second paragraph (“She was . . . piercing him”), the allusion to Saint Sebastian comments on Julian’s character primarily by suggesting that Julian

choices.label: holds an exaggerated sense of the importance of his problems
makes silly faces in order to cause his mother to laugh
prefers spiritual leaders to people in his neighborhood
seeks a religious solution to his troubled career ambitions

content.answer: holds an exaggerated sense of the importance of his problems

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
